# Battle of Ivangorod

| place             = Near Ivangorod, Swedish Empire (now Russia)
| coordinates       =
| result            = Russian victory
| combatant1        =
| combatant2        =
| commander1        =
| commander2        =  Gustav Baner
| strength1         = 4,500
| strength2         = 4,000 to 5,500 or 20,000
| casualties1       =
| casualties2       =
}}
The Battle of Ivangorod (; ) was one of the first battles of the Russo-Swedish War, where the Russians were able to defeat the main Swedish detachment and besiege Narva.
The size of the Swedish army ranges from 4,000 to 5,500 or 20,000, number of Russians no more 4,500
